src:
Julieta Díaz chicaneó a Mirtha Legrand: "invitala a Cristina, si a vos te gusta la polémica"
La actriz desafió a la conductora para que reciba en su mesa a Alberto Fernández y la vicepresidenta electa.

03 Nov 2019, 18:45

Julieta Díaz chicaneó a Mirtha Legrand en el programa del domingo para que invite a Alberto Fernández y a Cristina Kirchner.
"Tenés que traer a Alberto y a Cristina a la mesa", le dijo la actriz, luego de que la conductora dijera que quiere que que apoyará al gobierno para que el país salga adelante.
Mirtha aseguró que invitará a Alberto pero dudó sobre la ex presidenta. "A Cristina no sé", comentó, y Díaz contestó con reflejos y picardía:"A Cristina también, si a vos te gusta la polémica, Mirtha".
"Pero ella gana siempre", replicó la conductora. "Vos también", le dijo Julieta. Mirtha Wons, otra de las invitadas, acotó: "Sería interesante, son dos mujeres fuertes, estarìa bueno".
Y Legrand finalizò: "Por ahí no quiere venir. Alberto va a querer venir, mirá cómo se mueve. Ya está viajando, se mueve muchísimo".
text:
Julieta Díaz Chicaneó to Mirtha Legrand: "Invite her to Cristina, if you like the controversy"
The actress challenged the driver to receive Alberto Fernández and the elected vice president at her table.

03 Nov 2019, 18:45

Julieta Díaz chicaneó Mirtha Legrand on Sunday's program to invite Alberto Fernández and Cristina Kirchner.
"You have to bring Alberto and Cristina to the table," the actress told her, after the driver said she wants her to support the government so that the country moves forward.
Mirtha said he will invite Alberto but he doubted the former president. "I don't know Cristina," he said, and Diaz replied with reflexes and mischievousness: "Cristina too, if you like the controversy, Mirtha."
"But she always wins," replied the driver. "You too," Juliet told him. Mirtha Wons, another of the guests, said: "It would be interesting, they are two strong women, it would be good."
And Legrand concluded: "He doesn't want to come around. Alberto is going to want to come, see how he moves. He's already traveling, he moves a lot."
